title: Zion - Watch Face
summary: Modern, high contrast analog watch face with lots of customizable parts.

After install, launch the Android Wear app, tap on the gear in the upper right corner and tap on "Resync apps"(This may take a few minutes depending how many apps you have)NOTE: this is not caused by this watch face, but rather the Android Wear app.2. Choose Zion as your watch face.  Long press on its icon to access settings.3. descriptionHTML:
✔Highly customizable analog watch face
✔Customizable watch faces with analog hour, minute, second, date, battery, weather, temperature (F or C), number ticks, center dial, indicator background and more.
✔Create any color for the watch parts with our infinity color pickers
✔Control this app from your phone/tablet or your android wear watch.
✔Ambient mode is in color

Designed to work with Moto360, LG G Watch R, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3 & Asus ZenWatch

To install:
1. After install, launch the Android Wear app, tap on the gear in the upper right corner and tap on "Resync apps"
(This may take a few minutes depending how many apps you have)
NOTE: this is not caused by this watch face, but rather the Android Wear app.

2. Choose Zion as your watch face. Long press on its icon to access settings.

3. You may have to wait a minute or so to transfer to your watch over Bluetooth

FEATURES:

Parts with color picker:- This allows you to customize the color for each part.
✔Hour, Minute, Second
✔Date & its background
✔Temperature
✔Battery indicator & its background
✔Center Glow

Features with Hide/Show:
✔Date
✔Weather
✔Temperature
✔Battery indicator
✔Widget Background

✔Ambient mode has colors, it also comes with customizable (color/on/off) gauges as well.


This application is scalable for easy update in the future such as adding more designs.

If you prefer a different colors or see other themes:
Our store on Google Play is THAAUS: https://goo.gl/GRO9Xc
